title: I have high ping...
body:
Every pingtest says that i have 15-25 ping, But in every game i have like 150-200ping...
Can you help me?

replies.body:
Ayyyyy Lindow with the assist! 

Give the guide Lindow suggested a try, as that ping might be getting affected somewhere outside of your own network but there's still a chance that updating some of those network settings could give it a smoother connection.

Hey,

It's probably because your connection is having some issues to reach the game server. I'd recommend you to follow the steps of [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, and make sure to do them in custom game to avoid any penalties.

I hope that helps
